name: Broken Willow
description:
"She made no secret that she liked the supernatural.

Haunted places, Halloween stores, everything Halloween,

even when it wasn't even close to Halloween...

She was there taking pictures."

A girl's gone to look for her missing friend. But what will she find when she's out there?

Broken Willow is a short horror RPG made by Cow Legs and WintersPheonix for RPGHC jam #2 in a little over a week. Playtime is roughly ~10-15 minutes.

We hope you enjoy!
